text: Sakhakkale Munnoottu is a 1977 Indian Malayalam film, directed by J. Sasikumar and produced by T. K. Balachandran. The film stars Prem Nazir, KPAC Lalitha, Thikkurissi Sukumaran Nair and Jose Prakash in the lead roles. The film has musical score by G. Devarajan. ==Cast== *Prem Nazir *KPAC Lalitha *Thikkurissi Sukumaran Nair *Jose Prakash *Sankaradi *Sreelatha Namboothiri *Sumithra *T. K. Balachandran *Vidhubala ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by G. Devarajan and the lyrics were written by Mankombu Gopalakrishnan. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! No. !! Song !!
